greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f.: exp( Sum_{n>=1} x^(n^2) ).
formula: E.g.f.: exp((theta_3(x) - 1)/2), where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 23 2018
maple: seq(coeff(series(factorial(n)*(exp(add(x^(k^2),k=1..n))),x,n+1), x, n), n = 0 .. 25); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Oct 23 2018
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jan 31 2012
